payload.message:
Run ops patrol:
1. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/dashboard — check system health, digest pipeline, error rates
2. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/tasks?assignee=openclaw&status=pending — check for tasks assigned to you
3. If dashboard shows issues or anomalies, POST https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/propose with a fix proposal
4. POST https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/messages with a brief status update

Use X-API-Key header with the INGEST_API_KEY for all requests.
Be concise. Only propose actions for real issues, not normal operation.

Generate morning brief for Joey (7am CST = 13:00 UTC):

1. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/dashboard
2. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/tasks?status=pending
3. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/proposals?status=pending

Format a concise WhatsApp message:
- Overnight drops and digests sent
- System health (any errors?)
- Poe balance and burn rate
- Pending tasks and proposals needing approval
- Today's priorities

Deliver via WhatsApp using the hooks endpoint.
Use X-API-Key header with INGEST_API_KEY for Hub API calls.

Generate evening summary for Joey (8pm CST = 02:00 UTC next day):

1. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/dashboard
2. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/tasks
3. GET https://hub-production-f423.up.railway.app/api/ops/messages

Format a concise WhatsApp message:
- Work done today (from ops board messages)
- Tasks completed vs pending
- User metrics changes
- Tomorrow's queue

Deliver via WhatsApp.
Use X-API-Key header with INGEST_API_KEY for Hub API calls.
